Administrator Subclassing / Dual Class Drandum:
Certification Division, and study skills require serious effort. But the manipulation of the soul consuming more energy than all of these efforts. There was a time when the cancellation of certification was not possible - after such an operation, no one simply would not have survived.
But now there is a way - recently opened a plant that allows you to safely carry out the manipulation of the soul. The problem is that this method costs about 10000000 Aden ... Pay, and I'll cancel the certification.
If you cancel the certification all certified status, available now, disappear, and the certificates and seals are removed from the unlearned skills. Well, cancel the certification?
